pages.text: $(li)Capuchin monkeys are small creatures with black and cream-colored fur around their head that are located in the depths of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br2)You can find four variants:$(li)White Headed Capuchin $(li)Blond Capuchin $(li)Brown Capuchin $(li)Weeper Capuchin$(br2)

$(li)You can heal these creatures feeding them with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/chicken_egg)Chicken Eggs$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can bred feeding them with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/maggot)Maggots$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can feed them with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/banana)Bananas$(/l) to tame them too.$(br)$(li)If you give them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/ancient_dart)Ancient Darts$(/l) they will gain piercing damage.
